name: Waterbot
body: ## What does it do? Stuff like this: <JoeUser> so I was testing issue #86 the other day, and I can't reproduce it <waterbot> Issue 86: Crash on trying to open binary files. https://github.com/some/repo/issues/86 <BobNerd> yeah, I couldn't either -- he's using an old version, I think #51 fixed that <waterbot> Pull 51: Handle multiple encoding schemes. https://github.com/some/repo/pull/51 Besides supporting the GitHub issue system, there's modules for any Trac site or Google Code. The bot is hosted on Heroku and operates on Freenode and Mozilla networks.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
